The Ray stops just outside the Solarsystem out of Unicrons Reach. It appears to be a ship of some sort. About the same size of Unicron. The ship seems to have a Life source on it. The signal of the frequency seems to be that of a Transformer. the ship then moves slowly into Range and starts it's attack on unicron. sending out a pulse beam targeting Unicrons fleet of ships.

Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:Unicron felt the incoming ray, and he did not want to take any 
chances. Within moments, a massive army of Minions were orbiting 
around him, ready to open fire on whatever that was. Lunekill and 
Rockseeker had better give results soon...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> 
> A Light beam seems to be traveling fast from somewhere in 
deepspace. The Trajectory seems to be towards Unicron this ray seems 
to be of a frequency Not know  in any Database of any world that 
Unicron has ever Seen. It is closing Fast on him.
>
